mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT
FROM sys_menu a LEFT JOIN sys_menu p ON p.id = a.parent_id JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON rm.menu_id = a.id JOIN sys_role r ON r.id = rm.role_id JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = r.id JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = ur.user_id AND u.id = #{userId} WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND r.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND u.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
